title: History of the Civil War in 10 Battles, Part 22: How the Civil War Lives on Today
description: In this very final episode, James and Scott discuss the lasting effects of the Civil War and why it is the single most important event in the history of the United States. The Revolutionary War may have answered the question of whether America would become an independent nation, but the Civil War answered the question of what kind of nation it would be.
itunes:author: Scott Rank, PhD
